data.text: @debtex @jelp61 @autumnrosewell @KenilworthBook @PaddoxSchool @UKLaureate @Booktrust @NYALitFest @publishinguclan @bouncemarketing @BBCCWR @BLM_Agency Hooray! This is the best news. https://t.co/jcinepgSIm

@MoriTamsin @jelp61 @autumnrosewell @KenilworthBook @PaddoxSchool @UKLaureate @Booktrust @NYALitFest @publishinguclan @bouncemarketing @BBCCWR @BLM_Agency Thank you so much Tamsin! The children were still buzzing today and lovely emails from happy parents whose children are busily reading new books! xxx

@MoriTamsin @autumnrosewell @KenilworthBook @PaddoxSchool @debtex @UKLaureate @Booktrust @NYALitFest @publishinguclan @bouncemarketing @BBCCWR @BLM_Agency Thanks, Tamsin. He’s already plotting his revenge, I’m sure.

@ThomasHTaylor @autumnrosewell @KenilworthBook @PaddoxSchool @debtex @UKLaureate @Booktrust @NYALitFest @publishinguclan @bouncemarketing @BBCCWR @BLM_Agency Up with kitten power. I hope he recovers well and swiftly. https://t.co/g7o2e9fjCz

@ThomasHTaylor @MoriTamsin @KenilworthBook @PaddoxSchool @debtex @UKLaureate @Booktrust @NYALitFest @publishinguclan @bouncemarketing @BBCCWR @BLM_Agency Oh poor little kitty. Send gentle cuddles from me.

@autumnrosewell @MoriTamsin @KenilworthBook @PaddoxSchool @debtex @UKLaureate @Booktrust @NYALitFest @publishinguclan @bouncemarketing @BBCCWR @BLM_Agency Not happy about the cage, but healing nicely, thanks. He isn’t even a year old, so kitten power is helping him through. It will be easier when he can stop wearing the cone, poor thing.

@autumnrosewell @MoriTamsin @KenilworthBook @PaddoxSchool @debtex @UKLaureate @Booktrust @NYALitFest @publishinguclan @bouncemarketing @BBCCWR @BLM_Agency It was great, thanks, despite all the non-bookish dramas that happened too. Custard creams always welcome, but I hardly deserve them, and I’m still buzzing from the last batch😋

@ThomasHTaylor @MoriTamsin @KenilworthBook @PaddoxSchool @debtex @UKLaureate @Booktrust @NYALitFest @publishinguclan @bouncemarketing @BBCCWR @BLM_Agency Obvs. How has your book week been? Are more custard creams required for revival purposes?
